content:
I've checked for you, and here are some current promotions and coupons available for Hill's Science Diet and Royal Canin:

**Hill's Science Diet:**

1. **$5 Off Coupon**: Hill's Science Diet is offering a $5 off coupon on their website for new customers. You can sign up for their newsletter to receive the coupon.
2. **Buy One, Get One 50% Off**: Petco is currently running a BOGO 50% off deal on Hill's Science Diet dog and cat food. This offer is available in-store and online.
3. **$10 Off $50 Purchase**: Chewy.com has a coupon code "HILLS10" that gives you $10 off a $50 purchase of Hill's Science Diet products.
4. **Free Shipping**: Hill's Science Diet offers free shipping on orders over $49 on their website.

**Royal Canin:**

1. **$10 Off Coupon**: Royal Canin has a $10 off coupon available on their website for new customers. You can sign up for their newsletter to receive the coupon.
2. **Buy One, Get One 20% Off**: 1800PetMeds.com is offering a BOGO 20% off deal on Royal Canin dog and cat food.
3. **$5 Off $25 Purchase**: Petco has a digital coupon for $5 off a $25 purchase of Royal Canin products.
4. **Free Shipping**: Royal Canin offers free shipping on orders over $49 on their website.

Please note that these promotions and coupons are subject to change and may have expiration dates. I recommend checking the brands' websites, Petco, Chewy.com, and 1800PetMeds.com for the most up-to-date offers and to verify the coupons before making a purchase.

Remember to stack your savings by combining these offers with your organized coupons and any loyalty program rewards you may have!
